title: This Netflix Documentary Will Blow Your Mind!
description:
Have you watched the Netflix Documentary, "The Most Hated Man on the Internet"? If not, it will make your stomach turn. Bert's been waiting to address this, and today is the day. Listen! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
